about_the_game:
You are a brave traveler who got lost in a dark labyrinth, beware of the evil skeletons.

The evil skeletons know where you are, and they are already hunting you. Can you defeat them?

In this thrilling arcade game, you control a traveler who is seeking adventure in a mysterious labyrinth.

Good luck on your journey, and don't forget to collect all the coins! 🌟

Game Features:
- Coins
- Skeletons: Beware of the skeletons! They will try to catch you. Use your agility to avoid them.
- Defeat monsters: Your goal is to defeat all the skeletons before they catch you.
- Difficulty levels: The labyrinth may be challenging, with narrow corridors and hidden corners. But don't worry, you can handle it!
- 3D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
